properties.name: richtext_label_4
properties.text: Click here for sizing chart
properties.textTranslation: Click here for sizing chart

properties.name: richtext_label_6
properties.text: Please select the first manager/supervisor that needs to approve this Uniform Request Form. The person you specify will have the option of adding additional approvers to the approval chain.
properties.textTranslation: Please select the first manager/supervisor that needs to approve this Uniform Request Form. The person you specify will have the option of adding additional approvers to the approval chain.

properties.name: richtext_label_7
properties.text: Use the CC field to notify an interested party when this Uniform Request is Approved or Rejected.
properties.textTranslation: Use the CC field to notify an interested party when this Uniform Request is Approved or Rejected.

properties.name: Label 2
properties.text:
Lookup dont get it as html but Calc ctrl can ?!
https://williamadams.sharepoint.com/sites/electronicforms/Lists/Uniform/AllItems.aspx
https://williamadams.sharepoint.com/sites/electronicforms/Lists/UniformLogo/AllItems.aspx
1- get https://williamadams.sharepoint.com/sites/electronicforms/_api/web/lists/getbytitle('Uniform%20Logo')/items(3)
look for FieldValuesAsHtml
2- then https://williamadams.sharepoint.com/sites/electronicforms/_api/Web/Lists(guid'fd342ac9-98c9-49ed-8051-ccea1211fd38')/Items(3)/FieldValuesAsHtml  see src
